bomberman.core.ui
Class StartScreen

java.lang.Object
  bomberman.core.ui.StartScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
UIScreen, playn.core.Keyboard.Listener, playn.core.Pointer.Listener
public class StartScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements UIScreen

The StartScreen class provides a main UI screen, it's displayed when the program starts. Allows the user to begin the game.

Author:
Federico Scozzafava
